医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新抗体可能为乳腺癌提供有效的药物治疗冷泉港实验室教授尼古拉斯·唐克斯（Nicholas Tonks）在实验室中研制出一种抗体，可以阻止一种可能有助于某些乳腺癌扩散的酶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-antibody-may-offer- effective-drug-treatment-for-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-antibody-may-offer- effective-drug-treatment-for-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=885d8901-be1e-4ee5-9930-21dbcecf457a Mon, 30 Oct 2023 12:09:08 -0400 New antibody may offer effective drug treatment for breast cancer
肠道细菌产生的短链脂肪酸在树突状细胞伸长中发挥作用树突状细胞在哺乳动物免疫系统中发挥着关键作用。这些细胞存在于整个人体中，并且已知可以使用称为树突的可延伸“臂”捕获异物，即抗原。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Short-chain-fatty-acids- Produced-by-intestinal-bacteria-play-role-in-dendritic-cell-elongation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Short-chain-fatty-acids- Produced-by-intestinal-bacteria-play-role-in-dendritic-cell-elongation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ae01bae-216a-4438-a214-100930801172 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 11:43:08 -0400 Short-chain fatty acids produced by intestinal bacteria play role in dendritic cell elongation
远程样品管理将科学家从实验室工作台上解放出来使用高速、基于网络的通信协议 - Ziath 的 DP5 网络机架解码软件可以在笔记本电脑、台式机、电话或任何其他网络连接设备上运行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Remote-Sample-Management-Unchains-Scientists-from-Their-Lab-Bench.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Remote-Sample-Management-Unchains-Scientists-from-Their-Lab-Bench.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a01a8102-6e3f-426c-b7db-c49f1e387654 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:40:00 -0400 Remote sample management unchains scientists from their lab bench
新的 omicron 亚系激增，但辉瑞-BioNTech 二价加强剂保持有效性二价辉瑞 BioNTech COVID-19 信使核糖核酸 (mRNA) 疫苗 BNT162b2 BA.4/5 的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-omicron-sublineages-surge-but-Pfizer-BioNTech-bivalent-booster-retains-effectness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-omicron-sublineages-surge-but-Pfizer-BioNTech-bivalent-booster-retains- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19f887f1-4db7-4625-b881-6791897a3d16 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:35:00 -0400 New omicron sublineages surge, but Pfizer-BioNTech bivalent booster retains effectiveness
美国因极端高温导致的心血管相关死亡人数预计将增加根据美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究，预计 2036 年至 2065 年间，美国因酷热而导致的心血管相关死亡人数将会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Cardioangio-lated-deaths-due-to-extreme-heat-expected-to-increase- Between-in-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Cardioangio-lated-deaths-due-to-extreme-heat-expected-to-increase- Between-in-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1de9ba1d-c2b0-495c-a64e-9eb0c9c5e15f Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:20:14 -0400 Cardiovascular-related deaths due to extreme heat expected to increase between in the United States
研究揭示了与睡眠呼吸暂停风险相关的保护性和有害肠道微生物群肠道微生物群、相关代谢物与阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停 (OSA) 之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Research-reveals-both-protective-and-harmful-gut-microbiota-linked-with-sleep-apnea-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Research-reveals-both-protective-and-harmful-gut-microbiota-linked-with-sleep-apnea-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c537d61a-a182-402a-8555-5a5509dc8876 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:17:00 -0400 Research reveals both protective and harmful gut microbiota associated with sleep apnea risk
研究揭示生活方式选择和 DNA 甲基化在胃肿瘤风险中的相互作用《柳叶刀电子生物医学》上的一篇新论文探讨了这些变化是否可以预测未来患胃肿瘤的风险，以及表观遗传变化在此过程中如何与环境和生活方式因素相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-uncovers-interplay-of-lifestyle-choices-and-DNA-methylation-in-gastric-neoplasia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-uncovers-interplay-of-lifestyle-choices-and-DNA-methylation-in-gastric-neoplasia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d229c805-dfdb-4b8a-843f-18f67f32b0f6 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 10:16:00 -0400 Study uncovers interplay of lifestyle choices and DNA methylation in gastric neoplasia risk
新型二价疫苗对主要鱼类病原体显示出有希望的结果二价疫苗针对嗜水气单胞菌 (A. Hydrophila) 和无乳链球菌 (S. agalactiae) 的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-bivalent-vaccine-shows-promising-results-against-key-fish-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-bivalent-vaccine-shows-promising-results-against-key-fish-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80a07861-6092-4046-82e8-8b2e0c6c89f8 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:51:00 -0400 New bivalent vaccine shows promising results against key fish pathogens
带地暖的配水柜构成军团士兵患病风险挪威科学研究所 SINTEF 的研究人员一直在测试不同类型的配水柜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Water-distribution-cabinets-with-floor-heating-pose-Legionnaires-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Water-distribution-cabinets-with-floor-heating-pose-Legionnaires-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b04ad284-ccc9-4dee-a54f-1203e45484d8 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:49:24 -0400 Water distribution cabinets with floor heating pose Legionnaires' disease risk
在接受机械通气的创伤患者的常规护理中增加叹气呼吸是否会增加无需呼吸机的天数？研究人员调查了在机械通气创伤患者的标准护理方案中添加叹气呼吸是否会增加不使用呼吸机的天数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Does-adding-sigh-breaths-to-the-usual-care-of-trauma-病人-receiving-mechanical-ventilation-increase-ventilator-free-天.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Does-adding-sigh-breaths-to-the-usual-care-of-trauma-病人-receiving-mechanical-ventilation-increase-ventilator-free- days.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01e6c1ab-7f9d-4d5f-9fe3-757987892992 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Does adding sigh breaths to the usual care of trauma patients receiving mechanical ventilation increase ventilator-free days?
